selection_reasoning: The strategy for the next generation will focus on high-intensity refinement of the top two methodologies: force-directed relaxation (trial_2_2) and hexagonal grid variations (trial_1_1). We observed that Gen 3 failures (3_3, 3_5) were due to boundary constraint violations (r=0.5 at corners), so future prompts will emphasize strict boundary handling (r <= x, r <= 1-x, etc.) in the optimization and seeding phases.

trial_selections.reasoning: Current best performer (2.629964). The force-directed seeding is the most robust starting point found so far.
